external_games.name: Trainz 2022 DLC - Pro Train: F-Series - FAA Container

name: Trainz 2022: Pro Train - F-Series: FAA Container
summary: Combine the tried and tested with the modern! The new FAA container wagons used in the UK bring new colour to your fleet. In addition to various weather options, this trolley provides brand new containers that are compatible with the standard 20ft / 40ft container industry.
